name: Lunar Laundry
description:
Collect laundry, avoid dirt, reach the moon!

WASD / Arrows = Move
Left click = Speed up
Right click = Slow down

ALT+F4 = quit :)

Thanks to my jam buddy Erkberg, check out his entry: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/sea-of-lies

Third party tools used:

  • Path Creator by Sebastian Lague (https://github.com/SebLague/Path-Creator)
  • DOTween by Demigiant (http://dotween.demigiant.com)

Update 2021-04-27: Fixed some minor visual glitches at the end, exported builds for WIN/MAC/Linux/WebGL
